components.description: A single feather slanted to one side. On most platforms it's light brown with a dark brown barred or striped pattern. Can be used to talk about feathers or birds, or to represent something that is lightweight, fluffy, or soft.
components.title: Feather

title: Feather

version.description:
Unicode 13.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on March 10, 2020. 55 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 117 new emojis for 2020 (including sequences for gender and skin tone) listed under Emoji 13.0.

More about what's new in Unicode 13.0.

apple_vendor_description: A single, delicate feather floats gracefully on Apple devices, rendered with exquisite detail and a soft, ethereal glow. Its wispy barbs are depicted with subtle gradients and smooth, rounded edges, capturing the lightness and natural beauty of a bird's plume. On Apple devices, this emoji evokes feelings of peace, freedom, gentleness, and inspiration, often used to convey a sense of lightness or a soft touch in digital conversations.
